00094 BOOLEAN FindSoldierFromMouse( UINT16 *pusSoldierIndex, UINT32 *pMercFlags )
00095 {
00096       INT16                                     sMapPos;
00097       
00098       *pMercFlags = 0;
00099 
00100        if ( GetMouseMapPos( &sMapPos ) )
00101        {
00102                    if ( FindSoldier( sMapPos, pusSoldierIndex, pMercFlags ,FINDSOLDIERSAMELEVEL( gsInterfaceLevel ) ) )
00103                    {                            
00104                          return( TRUE );
00105                    }
00106        }
00107 
00108        return( FALSE );
00109 }

00128 
00129 UINT32 GetSoldierFindFlags( UINT16 ubID )
00130 {
00131       UINT32 MercFlags = 0;
00132       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00133 
00134  // Get pSoldier!
00135  pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubID ];
00136 
00137  // FInd out and set flags
00138  if ( ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
00139  {
00140             MercFlags |= SELECTED_MERC;
00141  }
00142  if ( ubID >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID && ubID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID )
00143  {
00144        if ( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !GetNumberInVehicle( pSoldier->bVehicleID ) )
00145        {
00146              // Don't do anything!
00147        }
00148        else
00149        {
00150                   // It's our own merc
00151              MercFlags  |= OWNED_MERC;
00152 
00153              if ( pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
00154              {
00155                         MercFlags |= ONDUTY_MERC;
00156              }
00157        }
00158  }
00159  else
00160  {
00161        // Check the side, etc
00162        if ( !pSoldier->bNeutral && (pSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum ) )
00163        {
00164                   // It's an enemy merc
00165              MercFlags  |= ENEMY_MERC;
00166        }
00167        else
00168        {
00169                   // It's not an enemy merc
00170              MercFlags  |= NEUTRAL_MERC;
00171        }
00172  }
00173 
00174       // Check for a guy who does not have an iterrupt ( when applicable! )
00175       if ( !OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pSoldier ) )
00176       {
00177                   MercFlags  |=     NOINTERRUPT_MERC;
00178       }
00179 
00180       if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
00181       {
00182             MercFlags  |=     UNCONSCIOUS_MERC;
00183       }
00184 
00185       if ( pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
00186       {
00187             MercFlags  |=     DEAD_MERC;
00188       }
00189 
00190       if ( pSoldier->bVisible != -1 || (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_MERCS) )
00191       {
00192             MercFlags  |=     VISIBLE_MERC;
00193       }
00194 
00195       return( MercFlags );
00196 }

00201 // THIS FUNCTION IS CALLED FAIRLY REGULARLY
00202 BOOLEAN FindSoldier( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 *pusSoldierIndex, UINT32 *pMercFlags, UINT32 uiFlags )
00203 {
00204       UINT32                        cnt;
00205       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
00206       SGPRect                       aRect;
00207       BOOLEAN                       fSoldierFound = FALSE;
00208       INT16                         sXMapPos, sYMapPos, sScreenX, sScreenY;
00209       INT16                         sMaxScreenMercY, sHeighestMercScreenY = -32000;
00210       BOOLEAN                       fDoFull;
00211       UINT8                         ubBestMerc = NOBODY;
00212       UINT16                        usAnimSurface;
00213       INT32                         iMercScreenX, iMercScreenY;
00214       BOOLEAN                       fInScreenRect = FALSE;
00215       BOOLEAN                       fInGridNo               = FALSE;
00216 
00217 
00218       *pusSoldierIndex = NOBODY;
00219       *pMercFlags              = 0;
00220 
00221       if ( _KeyDown( SHIFT ) )
00222       {
00223             uiFlags = FIND_SOLDIER_GRIDNO;
00224       }
00225 
00226       // Set some values
00227   if ( uiFlags & FIND_SOLDIER_BEGINSTACK )
00228       {
00229             gSoldierStack.bNum = 0;
00230             gSoldierStack.fUseGridNo = FALSE;
00231       }
00232 
00233 
00234       // Loop through all mercs and make go
00235       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
00236       {
00237             pSoldier                = MercSlots[ cnt ];
00238             fInScreenRect = FALSE;
00239             fInGridNo               = FALSE;
00240 
00241             if ( pSoldier != NULL )
00242             {                 
00243 
00244                   if ( pSoldier->bActive && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) && ( pSoldier->bVisible != -1 || (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_MERCS) ) )
00245                   {
00246                         // OK, ignore if we are a passenger...
00247                         if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & ( SOLDIER_PASSENGER | SOLDIER_DRIVER ) )
00248                         {
00249                               continue;
00250                         }
00251 
00252                         // If we want same level, skip if buggy's not on the same level!
00253                         if ( uiFlags & FIND_SOLDIER_SAMELEVEL )
00254                         {
00255                               if ( pSoldier->bLevel != (UINT8)( uiFlags >> 16 ) )
00256                               {
00257                                     continue;
00258                               }
00259                         }
00260 
00261 
00262                         // If we are selective.... do our own guys FULL and other with gridno!
00263                         // First look for owned soldiers, by way of the full method
00264                         if ( uiFlags & FIND_SOLDIER_GRIDNO )
00265                         {
00266                               fDoFull = FALSE;
00267                         }
00268                         else if ( uiFlags & FIND_SOLDIER_SELECTIVE )
00269                         {
00270                               if ( pSoldier->ubID >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID && pSoldier->ubID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID )
00271                               {
00272                                     fDoFull = TRUE;
00273                               }
00274                               else
00275                               {
00276                                     fDoFull = FALSE;
00277                               }
00278                         }
00279                         else
00280                         {
00281                               fDoFull = TRUE;
00282                         }
00283 
00284                         if ( fDoFull )
00285                         {
00286                               // Get Rect contained in the soldier
00287                               GetSoldierScreenRect( pSoldier, &aRect );
00288 
00289                               // Get XY From gridno
00290                               ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXMapPos, &sYMapPos );
00291 
00292                               // Get screen XY pos from map XY
00293                               // Be carefull to convert to cell cords
00294                               //CellXYToScreenXY( (INT16)((sXMapPos*CELL_X_SIZE)), (INT16)((sYMapPos*CELL_Y_SIZE)), &sScreenX, &sScreenY);
00295 
00296                               // Set mouse stuff
00297                               sScreenX = gusMouseXPos;
00298                               sScreenY = gusMouseYPos;
00299 
00300                               if ( IsPointInScreenRect( sScreenX, sScreenY, &aRect ) )
00301                               {
00302                                     fInScreenRect = TRUE;
00303                               }
00304 
00305                               if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo )
00306                               {
00307                                     fInGridNo               = TRUE;
00308                               }
00309                               
00310                               // ATE: If we are an enemy....
00311                               if ( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SMART_CURSOR ] )
00312                               {
00313                                     if ( pSoldier->ubID >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID && pSoldier->ubID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID )
00314                                     {
00315                                           // ATE: NOT if we are in action or comfirm action mode
00316                                           if ( gCurrentUIMode != ACTION_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != CONFIRM_ACTION_MODE || gUIActionModeChangeDueToMouseOver )
00317                                           {
00318                                                 fInScreenRect = FALSE;
00319                                           }
00320                                     }
00321                               }
00322 
00323                               // ATE: Refine this further....
00324                               // Check if this is the selected guy....
00325                               if ( pSoldier->ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
00326                               {
00327                                     // Are we in action mode...
00328                                     if ( gCurrentUIMode == ACTION_MODE || gCurrentUIMode == CONFIRM_ACTION_MODE )
00329                                     {
00330                                           // Are we in medic mode?
00331                                           if ( GetActionModeCursor( pSoldier ) != AIDCURS )
00332                                           {
00333                                                 fInScreenRect = FALSE;
00334                                                 fInGridNo               = FALSE;
00335                                           }
00336                                     }
00337                               }
00338 
00339                               // Make sure we are always on guy if we are on same gridno
00340                               if ( fInScreenRect || fInGridNo )
00341                               {
00342                                     // Check if we are a vehicle and refine if so....
00343                                     if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00344                                     {
00345                                           usAnimSurface = GetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
00346 
00347                                           if ( usAnimSurface != INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE )
00348                                           {
00349                                                 iMercScreenX = (INT32)( sScreenX - aRect.iLeft );
00350                 iMercScreenY = (INT32)( -1 * ( sScreenY - aRect.iBottom ) );
00351                                                       
00352                                                 if ( !CheckVideoObjectScreenCoordinateInData( gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject, pSoldier->usAniFrame, iMercScreenX, iMercScreenY ) )
00353                                                 {
00354                                                       continue;
00355                                                 }
00356                                           }
00357                                     }
00358 
00359                                     // If thgis is from a gridno, use mouse pos!
00360                                     if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo )
00361                                     {
00362 
00363                                     }
00364 
00365                                      // Only break here if we're not creating a stack of these fellas
00366                                      if ( uiFlags & FIND_SOLDIER_BEGINSTACK )
00367                                      {
00368                                            gfHandleStack = TRUE;
00369 
00370                                                 // Add this one!
00371                                            gSoldierStack.ubIDs[ gSoldierStack.bNum ] = pSoldier->ubID;
00372                                            gSoldierStack.bNum++;
00373 
00374                                            // Determine if it's the current
00375                                            if ( aRect.iBottom > sHeighestMercScreenY )
00376                                            {
00377                                                       sMaxScreenMercY = (UINT16)aRect.iBottom;
00378                                                       sHeighestMercScreenY = sMaxScreenMercY;
00379 
00380                                                       gSoldierStack.bCur = gSoldierStack.bNum - 1;
00381                                            }
00382                                      }
00383                                      //Are we handling a stack right now?
00384                                      else if ( gfHandleStack )
00385                                      {
00386                                             // Are we the selected stack?
00387                                                 if ( gSoldierStack.fUseGridNo )
00388                                                 {
00389                                                        fSoldierFound = FALSE;
00390                                                        break;           
00391                                                 }
00392                                                 else if ( gSoldierStack.ubIDs[ gSoldierStack.bCur ] == pSoldier->ubID )
00393                                                 {
00394                                                        // Set it!
00395                                                        ubBestMerc = pSoldier->ubID;
00396 
00397                                                        fSoldierFound = TRUE;
00398                                                        break;           
00399                                                 }
00400                                      }
00401                                      else
00402                                      {
00403                                            // Determine if it's the best one
00404                                            if ( aRect.iBottom > sHeighestMercScreenY )
00405                                            {
00406                                                       sMaxScreenMercY = (UINT16)aRect.iBottom;
00407                                                       sHeighestMercScreenY = sMaxScreenMercY;
00408 
00409                                                       // Set it!
00410                                                       ubBestMerc = pSoldier->ubID;
00411                                            }
00412 
00413                                            fSoldierFound = TRUE;
00414                                            // Don't break here, find the rest!
00415 
00416                                      }
00417                               }
00418                         
00419                         }
00420                         else
00421                         {
00422                               //Otherwise, look for a bad guy by way of gridno]
00423                               // Selective means don't give out enemy mercs if they are not visible
00424                               
00425                               ///&& !NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel )
00426                               if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo && !NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, (INT8)gsInterfaceLevel ) )
00427                               {
00428                                     // Set it!
00429                                     ubBestMerc = pSoldier->ubID;
00430 
00431                                     fSoldierFound = TRUE;
00432                                     break;
00433                               }
00434                         }
00435                   }
00436             }
00437       }
00438 
00439       if ( fSoldierFound && ubBestMerc != NOBODY )
00440       {
00441              *pusSoldierIndex = (UINT16)ubBestMerc;
00442 
00443              (*pMercFlags) = GetSoldierFindFlags( ubBestMerc );
00444 
00445               return( TRUE );
00446 
00447       }
00448       else
00449       {
00450             // If we were handling a stack, and we have not found anybody, end
00451             if ( gfHandleStack && !( uiFlags & ( FIND_SOLDIER_BEGINSTACK | FIND_SOLDIER_SELECTIVE ) ) )
00452             {
00453                   if ( gSoldierStack.fUseGridNo )
00454                   {
00455                         if ( gSoldierStack.sUseGridNoGridNo != sGridNo )
00456                         {
00457                               gfHandleStack = FALSE;
00458                         }
00459                   }
00460                   else
00461                   {
00462                         gfHandleStack = FALSE;
00463                   }
00464             }
00465       }
00466       return( FALSE );
00467 }
00468 
00469 BOOLEAN CycleSoldierFindStack( UINT16 usMapPos )
00470 {
00471       UINT16  usSoldierIndex;
00472       UINT32      uiMercFlags;
00473 
00474       // Have we initalized for this yet?
00475       if ( !gfHandleStack )
00476       {
00477             if ( FindSoldier( usMapPos, &usSoldierIndex, &uiMercFlags , FINDSOLDIERSAMELEVEL( gsInterfaceLevel ) | FIND_SOLDIER_BEGINSTACK ) )
00478             {
00479                   gfHandleStack = TRUE;
00480             }
00481 
00482       }
00483 
00484       if ( gfHandleStack )
00485       {
00486             // we are cycling now?
00487             if ( !gSoldierStack.fUseGridNo )
00488             {
00489                   gSoldierStack.bCur++;
00490             }
00491 
00492             gfUIForceReExamineCursorData = TRUE;
00493 
00494             if ( gSoldierStack.bCur == gSoldierStack.bNum )
00495             {
00496                   if ( !gSoldierStack.fUseGridNo )
00497                   {
00498                         gSoldierStack.fUseGridNo = TRUE;
00499                         gUIActionModeChangeDueToMouseOver = FALSE;
00500                     gSoldierStack.sUseGridNoGridNo = usMapPos;
00501                   }
00502                   else
00503                   {
00504                         gSoldierStack.bCur = 0;
00505                         gSoldierStack.fUseGridNo = FALSE;
00506                   }
00507             }
00508 
00509 
00510             if ( !gSoldierStack.fUseGridNo )
00511             {
00512                   gusUIFullTargetID = gSoldierStack.ubIDs[ gSoldierStack.bCur ];
00513                   guiUIFullTargetFlags = GetSoldierFindFlags( gusUIFullTargetID );
00514                   guiUITargetSoldierId = gusUIFullTargetID;
00515                   gfUIFullTargetFound                  = TRUE;
00516             }
00517             else
00518             {
00519                   gfUIFullTargetFound                  = FALSE;
00520             }
00521 
00522 
00523       }
00524 
00525       // Return if we are in the cycle mode now...
00526       return( gfHandleStack );
00527 }

00529 
00530 SOLDIERTYPE * SimpleFindSoldier( INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel )
00531 {
00532       UINT8 ubID;
00533 
00534       ubID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, bLevel );
00535       if ( ubID == NOBODY )
00536       {
00537             return( NULL );
00538       }
00539       else
00540       {
00541             return( MercPtrs[ ubID ] );
00542       }
00543 }
00544 
00545 BOOLEAN IsValidTargetMerc( UINT8 ubSoldierID )
00546 {
00547       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubSoldierID ];
00548 
00549 
00550       // CHECK IF ACTIVE!
00551       if ( !pSoldier->bActive )
00552       {
00553             return( FALSE );
00554       }
00555 
00556       // CHECK IF DEAD
00557       if( pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
00558       {
00559             //return( FALSE );
00560       }
00561 
00562       // IF BAD GUY - CHECK VISIVILITY
00563       if ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
00564       {
00565             if ( pSoldier->bVisible == -1 && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags&SHOW_ALL_MERCS) )
00566             {
00567                   return( FALSE  );
00568             }
00569       }
00570 
00571       return( TRUE );
00572 }

00574 
00575 BOOLEAN IsGridNoInScreenRect( INT16 sGridNo, SGPRect *pRect )
00576 {
00577       INT32 iXTrav, iYTrav;
00578       INT16 sMapPos;
00579 
00580       // Start with top left corner
00581       iXTrav = pRect->iLeft;
00582       iYTrav = pRect->iTop;
00583 
00584       do
00585       {
00586             do
00587             {
00588                   GetScreenXYGridNo( (INT16)iXTrav, (INT16)iYTrav, &sMapPos );
00589                   
00590                   if ( sMapPos == sGridNo )
00591                   {
00592                         return( TRUE );
00593                   }
00594 
00595                   iXTrav += WORLD_TILE_X;
00596 
00597             } while( iXTrav < pRect->iRight );
00598 
00599             iYTrav += WORLD_TILE_Y;
00600             iXTrav = pRect->iLeft;
00601 
00602       } while( iYTrav < pRect->iBottom );
00603 
00604       return( FALSE );
00605 }

00607 
00608 void GetSoldierScreenRect( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SGPRect *pRect )
00609 {
00610             INT16 sMercScreenX, sMercScreenY;
00611             UINT16      usAnimSurface;
00612 //          ETRLEObject *pTrav;
00613 //          UINT32 usHeight, usWidth;
00614 
00615             GetSoldierScreenPos( pSoldier, &sMercScreenX, &sMercScreenY );
00616 
00617             usAnimSurface = GetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
00618             if ( usAnimSurface == INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE )
00619             {
00620                   pRect->iLeft            = sMercScreenX;
00621                   pRect->iTop             = sMercScreenY;
00622                   pRect->iBottom    = sMercScreenY + 5;
00623                   pRect->iRight           = sMercScreenX + 5;
00624 
00625                   return;
00626             }
00627 
00628             //pTrav = &(gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->pETRLEObject[ pSoldier->usAniFrame ] );
00629             //usHeight                    = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
00630             //usWidth                           = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
00631 
00632             pRect->iLeft            = sMercScreenX;
00633             pRect->iTop             = sMercScreenY;
00634             pRect->iBottom    = sMercScreenY + pSoldier->sBoundingBoxHeight;
00635             pRect->iRight           = sMercScreenX + pSoldier->sBoundingBoxWidth;
00636 }
00637 
00638 void GetSoldierAnimDims( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 *psHeight, INT16 *psWidth )
00639 {
00640       UINT16                                                                   usAnimSurface;
00641 
00642       usAnimSurface = GetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
00643 
00644       if ( usAnimSurface == INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE )
00645       {
00646             *psHeight                           = (INT16)5;
00647             *psWidth                            = (INT16)5;
00648             
00649             return;
00650       }
00651 
00652       // OK, noodle here on what we should do... If we take each frame, it will be different slightly
00653       // depending on the frame and the value returned here will vary thusly. However, for the
00654       // uses of this function, we should be able to use just the first frame...
00655 
00656       if ( pSoldier->usAniFrame >= gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->usNumberOfObjects )
00657       {
00658             int i = 0;
00659       }
00660 
00661       *psHeight                           = (INT16)pSoldier->sBoundingBoxHeight;
00662       *psWidth                            = (INT16)pSoldier->sBoundingBoxWidth;
00663 }
00664 
00665 void GetSoldierAnimOffsets( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 *sOffsetX, INT16 *sOffsetY )
00666 {
00667       UINT16                                                                   usAnimSurface;
00668 
00669       usAnimSurface = GetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
00670 
00671       if ( usAnimSurface == INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE )
00672       {
00673             *sOffsetX                           = (INT16)0;
00674             *sOffsetY                           = (INT16)0;
00675 
00676             return;
00677       }
00678 
00679       *sOffsetX                           = (INT16)pSoldier->sBoundingBoxOffsetX;
00680       *sOffsetY                           = (INT16)pSoldier->sBoundingBoxOffsetY;
00681 }
00682 
00683 void GetSoldierScreenPos( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 *psScreenX, INT16 *psScreenY )
00684 {
00685             INT16 sMercScreenX, sMercScreenY;
00686             FLOAT dOffsetX, dOffsetY;
00687             FLOAT dTempX_S, dTempY_S;
00688             UINT16                                                                   usAnimSurface;
00689 //          ETRLEObject *pTrav;
00690 
00691             usAnimSurface = GetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
00692 
00693             if ( usAnimSurface == INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE )
00694             {
00695                   *psScreenX = 0;
00696                   *psScreenY = 0;
00697                   return;
00698             }
00699 
00700             // Get 'TRUE' merc position
00701             dOffsetX = pSoldier->dXPos - gsRenderCenterX;
00702             dOffsetY = pSoldier->dYPos - gsRenderCenterY;
00703 
00704             FloatFromCellToScreenCoordinates( dOffsetX, dOffsetY, &dTempX_S, &dTempY_S );
00705 
00706             //pTrav = &(gAnimSurfaceDatabase[ usAnimSurface ].hVideoObject->pETRLEObject[ pSoldier->usAniFrame ] );
00707 
00708             sMercScreenX = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 ) + (INT16)dTempX_S;
00709             sMercScreenY = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 ) + (INT16)dTempY_S;
00710 
00711             // Adjust starting screen coordinates
00712             sMercScreenX      -= gsRenderWorldOffsetX; 
00713             sMercScreenY      -= gsRenderWorldOffsetY; 
00714             sMercScreenY      -= gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].sHeight;
00715 
00716             // Adjust for render height
00717             sMercScreenY += gsRenderHeight;
00718 
00719             // Add to start position of dest buffer
00720             //sMercScreenX += pTrav->sOffsetX;
00721             //sMercScreenY += pTrav->sOffsetY;
00722             sMercScreenX += pSoldier->sBoundingBoxOffsetX;
00723             sMercScreenY += pSoldier->sBoundingBoxOffsetY;
00724 
00725 
00726             sMercScreenY -= pSoldier->sHeightAdjustment;
00727 
00728             *psScreenX = sMercScreenX;
00729             *psScreenY = sMercScreenY;
00730 }

00732 // THE TRUE SCREN RECT DOES NOT TAKE THE OFFSETS OF BUDDY INTO ACCOUNT!
00733 void GetSoldierTRUEScreenPos( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 *psScreenX, INT16 *psScreenY )
00734 {
00735             INT16 sMercScreenX, sMercScreenY;

00739 
00740             usAnimSurface = GetSoldierAnimationSurface( pSoldier, pSoldier->usAnimState );
00741 
00742             if ( usAnimSurface == INVALID_ANIMATION_SURFACE )
00743             {
00744                   *psScreenX = 0;
00745                   *psScreenY = 0;
00746                   return;
00747             }
00748 
00749             // Get 'TRUE' merc position
00750             dOffsetX = pSoldier->dXPos - gsRenderCenterX;
00751             dOffsetY = pSoldier->dYPos - gsRenderCenterY;
00752 
00753             FloatFromCellToScreenCoordinates( dOffsetX, dOffsetY, &dTempX_S, &dTempY_S );
00754 
00755             sMercScreenX = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 ) + (INT16)dTempX_S;
00756             sMercScreenY = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 ) + (INT16)dTempY_S;
00757 
00758             // Adjust starting screen coordinates
00759             sMercScreenX      -= gsRenderWorldOffsetX; 
00760             sMercScreenY      -= gsRenderWorldOffsetY; 
00761 
00762             // Adjust for render height
00763             sMercScreenY += gsRenderHeight;
00764             sMercScreenY      -= gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].sHeight;
00765 
00766             sMercScreenY -= pSoldier->sHeightAdjustment;
00767 
00768 
00769             *psScreenX = sMercScreenX;
00770             *psScreenY = sMercScreenY;
00771 }

00773 
00774 BOOLEAN GridNoOnScreen( INT16 sGridNo )
00775 {
00776       INT16 sNewCenterWorldX, sNewCenterWorldY;
00777       INT16 sWorldX;
00778       INT16 sWorldY;
00779   INT16 sAllowance = 20;
00780       
00781   if ( gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y == 20 )
00782   {
00783     sAllowance = 40;
00784   }
00785 
00786       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sNewCenterWorldX, &sNewCenterWorldY );
00787 
00788       // Get screen coordinates for current position of soldier
00789       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( (INT16)(sNewCenterWorldX), (INT16)(sNewCenterWorldY), &sWorldX, &sWorldY);
00790 
00791       // ATE: OK, here, adjust the top value so that it's a tile and a bit over, because of our mercs!
00792       if ( sWorldX >= gsTopLeftWorldX && sWorldX <= gsBottomRightWorldX &&
00793                    sWorldY >= ( gsTopLeftWorldY + sAllowance )    && sWorldY <= ( gsBottomRightWorldY + 20 ) )
00794       {
00795             return( TRUE );
00796       }
00797       return( FALSE );
00798 }

00801 BOOLEAN SoldierOnScreen( UINT16 usID )
00802 {
00803       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00804 
00805       // Get pointer of soldier
00806       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ usID ];
00807 
00808       return( GridNoOnScreen( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );
00809 }

00818 
00819 BOOLEAN SoldierLocationRelativeToScreen( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usReasonID, INT8 *pbDirection, UINT32 *puiScrollFlags )
00820 {
00821       INT16 sWorldX;
00822       INT16 sWorldY;
00823       INT16 sY, sX;
00824       static BOOLEAN fCountdown = 0;
00825       INT16 sScreenCenterX, sScreenCenterY;
00826       INT16 sDistToCenterY, sDistToCenterX;
00827 
00828       *puiScrollFlags = 0;
00829 
00830       sX = CenterX( sGridNo );
00831       sY = CenterY( sGridNo );
00832 
00833       // Get screen coordinates for current position of soldier
00834       GetWorldXYAbsoluteScreenXY( (INT16)(sX/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(sY/CELL_Y_SIZE), &sWorldX, &sWorldY);
00835 
00836       // Find the diustance from render center to true world center
00837       sDistToCenterX = gsRenderCenterX - gCenterWorldX;
00838       sDistToCenterY = gsRenderCenterY - gCenterWorldY;
00839       
00840       // From render center in world coords, convert to render center in "screen" coords
00841       FromCellToScreenCoordinates( sDistToCenterX , sDistToCenterY, &sScreenCenterX, &sScreenCenterY );
00842 
00843       // Subtract screen center
00844       sScreenCenterX += gsCX;
00845       sScreenCenterY += gsCY;
00846 
00847       // Adjust for offset origin!
00848       sScreenCenterX += 0;
00849       sScreenCenterY += 10;
00850 
00851       // Get direction
00852       //*pbDirection = atan8( sScreenCenterX, sScreenCenterY, sWorldX, sWorldY );
00853       *pbDirection = atan8( gsRenderCenterX, gsRenderCenterY, (INT16)(sX), (INT16)(sY) );
00854 
00855       // Check values!
00856       if ( sWorldX > ( sScreenCenterX + 20 ) ) 
00857       {
00858             (*puiScrollFlags) |= SCROLL_RIGHT;
00859       }
00860       if ( sWorldX < ( sScreenCenterX - 20 ) ) 
00861       {
00862             (*puiScrollFlags) |= SCROLL_LEFT;
00863       }
00864       if ( sWorldY > ( sScreenCenterY + 20 ) )
00865       {
00866             (*puiScrollFlags) |= SCROLL_DOWN;
00867       }
00868       if ( sWorldY < ( sScreenCenterY - 20 ) )
00869       {
00870             (*puiScrollFlags) |= SCROLL_UP;
00871       }
00872 
00873 
00874       // If we are on screen, stop
00875       if ( sWorldX >= gsTopLeftWorldX && sWorldX <= gsBottomRightWorldX &&
00876                    sWorldY >= gsTopLeftWorldY   && sWorldY <= ( gsBottomRightWorldY + 20 ) )
00877       {
00878             // CHECK IF WE ARE DONE...
00879             if ( fCountdown > gScrollSlideInertiaDirection[ *pbDirection ] )
00880             {
00881                   fCountdown = 0;
00882                   return( FALSE );
00883             }
00884             else
00885             {
00886                   fCountdown++;
00887             }
00888       }
00889 
00890       return( TRUE );
00891 }
00892 
00893 BOOLEAN IsPointInSoldierBoundingBox( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00894 {
00895       SGPRect                       aRect;
00896 
00897       // Get Rect contained in the soldier
00898       GetSoldierScreenRect( pSoldier, &aRect );
00899 
00900       if ( IsPointInScreenRect( sX, sY, &aRect ) )
00901       {
00902             return( TRUE );
00903       }
00904 
00905       return( FALSE );
00906 }

00908 
00909 BOOLEAN FindRelativeSoldierPosition( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 *usFlags, INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00910 {
00911       SGPRect                       aRect;
00912       INT16                         sRelX, sRelY;
00913       FLOAT                         dRelPer;
00914 
00915 
00916       // Get Rect contained in the soldier
00917       GetSoldierScreenRect( pSoldier, &aRect );
00918 
00919       if ( IsPointInScreenRectWithRelative( sX, sY, &aRect, &sRelX, &sRelY ) )
00920       {
00921             dRelPer = (FLOAT)sRelY / ( aRect.iBottom - aRect.iTop );
00922 
00923             // Determine relative positions
00924             switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
00925             {
00926                   case ANIM_STAND:
00927 
00928                         if ( dRelPer < .2 )
00929                         {
00930                               (*usFlags )= TILE_FLAG_HEAD;
00931                               return( TRUE );
00932                         }
00933                         else if ( dRelPer < .6 )
00934                         {
00935                               (*usFlags )= TILE_FLAG_MID;
00936                               return( TRUE );
00937                         }
00938                         else
00939                         {
00940                               (*usFlags )= TILE_FLAG_FEET;
00941                               return( TRUE );
00942                         }
00943                         break;
00944 
00945                   case ANIM_CROUCH:
00946 
00947                         if ( dRelPer < .2 )
00948                         {
00949                               (*usFlags )= TILE_FLAG_HEAD;
00950                               return( TRUE );
00951                         }
00952                         else if ( dRelPer < .7 )
00953                         {
00954                               (*usFlags )= TILE_FLAG_MID;
00955                               return( TRUE );
00956                         }
00957                         else
00958                         {
00959                               (*usFlags )= TILE_FLAG_FEET;
00960                               return( TRUE );
00961                         }
00962                         break;
00963 
00964             }
00965       }
00966 
00967       return( FALSE );
00968 }
00969 
00970 // VERY quickly finds a soldier at gridno , ( that is visible )
00971 UINT8 QuickFindSoldier( INT16 sGridNo )
00972 {
00973       UINT32 cnt;
00974       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00975 
00976       // Loop through all mercs and make go
00977       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
00978       {
00979             pSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
00980 
00981             if ( pSoldier != NULL )
00982             {                 
00983                   if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo && pSoldier->bVisible != -1 )
00984                   {
00985                         return( (UINT8)cnt );
00986                   }
00987             }
00988 
00989       }
00990 
00991       return( NOBODY );
00992 }

00994 
00995 void GetGridNoScreenPos( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubLevel, INT16 *psScreenX, INT16 *psScreenY )
00996 {
00997             INT16 sScreenX, sScreenY;
00998             FLOAT dOffsetX, dOffsetY;
00999             FLOAT dTempX_S, dTempY_S;
01000 
01001             // Get 'TRUE' merc position
01002             dOffsetX = (FLOAT)( CenterX( sGridNo ) - gsRenderCenterX );
01003             dOffsetY = (FLOAT)( CenterY( sGridNo ) - gsRenderCenterY );
01004 
01005             // OK, DONT'T ASK... CONVERSION TO PROPER Y NEEDS THIS...
01006             dOffsetX -= CELL_Y_SIZE;
01007 
01008             FloatFromCellToScreenCoordinates( dOffsetX, dOffsetY, &dTempX_S, &dTempY_S );
01009 
01010             sScreenX = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_X - gsVIEWPORT_START_X ) /2 ) + (INT16)dTempX_S;
01011             sScreenY = ( ( gsVIEWPORT_END_Y - gsVIEWPORT_START_Y ) /2 ) + (INT16)dTempY_S;
01012 
01013             // Adjust starting screen coordinates
01014             sScreenX    -= gsRenderWorldOffsetX; 
01015             sScreenY    -= gsRenderWorldOffsetY; 
01016 
01017             sScreenY += gsRenderHeight;
01018 
01019             // Adjust for world height
01020             sScreenY -= gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight;
01021 
01022             // Adjust for level height
01023             if ( ubLevel )
01024             {
01025                   sScreenY -= ROOF_LEVEL_HEIGHT;
01026             }
01027 
01028             *psScreenX = sScreenX;
01029             *psScreenY = sScreenY;
01030 }
